TopicTitle: My game keeps crashing and I dont know why

Articles.Content:
I was looking for a Topic catering to this question only, so I wouldnt have to make a new one just for me. If youd like, you can stick this one to the top.

So, on we go: I keep crashing to desktop and naturally, I expected some not-updated mod to be the culprit. I removed Firespitter and KIS and launched again but - as I just learned - to no avail. Theres only one mod remaining incompatible with KSP (According to KSP itself) which is MechJeb. Im not quite willing to let go of MJ just yet, unless someone can truly confirm MJ is the cause ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Anyway - my latest Log:

[https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0B3OvfUn1lRtRfjI3d0x5SUtOTHlnMVQtMHR0MktPa3FCVzEteXZSVnlSZVc4Qmp3eFFDbUk&usp=sharing](https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0B3OvfUn1lRtRfjI3d0x5SUtOTHlnMVQtMHR0MktPa3FCVzEteXZSVnlSZVc4Qmp3eFFDbUk&usp=sharing)

Maybe this little bit of Info helps - so far I seemingly only crash when flying my surveyor-planes around on Kerbin. Once I crashed approaching the Space Center.

Ill keep posting if I come across usefull info myself. 

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/118658-New-Heat-System-causes-memory-leak](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/118658-New-Heat-System-causes-memory-leak)

Seeing as most of my crashes happened flying with planes (preferably with several engines because I like going fast) I guess this is the problem I had with most crashes as well. 

Just now I crashed from the VAB, though, so there must be more.

Memory leak in 1.0.2 is only the heat indicator.

do you get a spam of NRE when crashing?

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Serialization depth limit exceeded at 'OcclusionData'. There may be an object composition cycle in one or more of your serialized classes.

> 
> Serialization depth limit exceeded at 'ThermalLink'. There may be an object composition cycle in one or more of your serialized classes.

reinstall ksp get 1.0.2

- - - Updated - - -

Get lates dev build from mechjeb too : [http://jenkins.mumech.com/job/MechJeb2/](http://jenkins.mumech.com/job/MechJeb2/)

> 
> Ill keep posting if I come across usefull info myself. 
> [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/118658-New-Heat-System-causes-memory-leak](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/118658-New-Heat-System-causes-memory-leak)
> 
> Seeing as most of my crashes happened flying with planes (preferably with several engines because I like going fast) I guess this is the problem I had with most crashes as well. 
> 
> Just now I crashed from the VAB, though, so there must be more.

Not necessarily. Memory usage slowly increases the longer you play so if the temp gauged leak got you close enough to the limit the other smaller leaks could have pushed over.
